参考 learn_httr/pkgdown/intro

```{r}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(stringi)
library(fs)
```

```{r}
dir_info(".") %>% 
    filter(path %>% str_detect("\\.Rmd$"),
           type == 'file'
           ) %>% 
    mutate(
        encoding = map(path,~stri_enc_detect(read_file(.))[[1]])
    ) %>% 
    unnest() %>% 
    group_by(path) %>% 
    filter(Confidence == max(Confidence)) %>% 
    select(path,Encoding)
```
